courses.name: Introduction to the Threat Landscape
courses.description: Overview of the cyberthreat landscape, key actors, and first principles to keep users and networks safe.

courses.name: Getting Started in Cybersecurity
courses.description: Non-technical introduction to the most important cybersecurity fundamentals for business roles.

courses.name: Technical Introduction to Cybersecurity
courses.description: Technical fundamentals for people moving into hands-on cybersecurity roles.

courses.name: FortiGate Operator
courses.description: Operate common FortiGate features and perform high-level device operations.

courses.name: FortiGate Administrator
courses.description: Protect networks using the most common FortiGate features.

courses.name: FortiAnalyzer Analyst
courses.description: Use FortiAnalyzer for centralized logging; identify threats via log analysis; manage events and reports.

courses.name: FortiSIEM Analyst
courses.description: Operate FortiSIEM and integrate it into the network awareness infrastructure.

courses.name: FortiSOAR Administrator
courses.description: Deploy, configure, manage, and monitor FortiSOAR in a SOC environment.

courses.name: FortiSandbox Administrator
courses.description: Improve protection against advanced threats and understand how FortiSandbox detects them.

courses.name: FortiEDR
courses.description: Protect endpoints from advanced attacks with orchestrated, real-time incident response.

courses.name: FortiGate Administrator
courses.description: Protect networks using the most common FortiGate features.

courses.name: FortiClient EMS Administrator
courses.description: Use FortiClient EMS to deploy and provision FortiClient.

courses.name: FortiManager Administrator
courses.description: Centralize administration and change control for many FortiGate devices with FortiManager.

courses.name: FortiAnalyzer Administrator
courses.description: Deploy, configure, and secure FortiAnalyzer; register/analyze devices; manage logging and reporting.

courses.name: FortiAuthenticator Administrator
courses.description: Administer identity and access with FortiAuthenticator.

courses.name: FortiNAC
courses.description: Implement Network Access Control to secure device onboarding and segmentation.

courses.name: FortiSwitch
courses.description: Deploy and administer FortiSwitch in secure campus/branch LANs.

courses.name: Secure Wireless LAN Administrator
courses.description: Deploy and manage secure wireless LAN with Fortinet solutions.

courses.name: FortiOS Administrator (or FortiGate Administrator)
courses.description: Protect and operate networks using core FortiOS/FortiGate features.

courses.name: FortiWeb Administrator
courses.description: Deploy, configure, and troubleshoot the Fortinet web application firewall.

certifications.name: Fortinet Certified Solution Specialist (FCSS) — Secure Networking

courses.name: Network Security Support Engineer
courses.description: Diagnose and troubleshoot common networking and security problems in Fortinet solutions.

courses.name: LAN Edge Architect
courses.description: Design secure wired and wireless connectivity with FortiGate, FortiAP, FortiSwitch, and FortiAuthenticator.

courses.name: OT Security Architect
courses.description: Design, deploy, administer, and monitor Fortinet solutions to secure OT infrastructures.

courses.name: Enterprise Firewall Administrator
courses.description: Implement and centrally manage an enterprise security infrastructure with multiple FortiGate devices.

courses.name: SD-WAN Architect
courses.description: Plan common SD-WAN deployment scenarios using Fortinet Secure SD-WAN.

certifications.name: Fortinet Certified Solution Specialist (FCSS) — Secure Access Service Edge (SASE)

courses.name: FortiSASE Administrator
courses.description: Configure FortiSASE policies and deployment, user authentication, use cases, and monitoring.

courses.name: SD-WAN Architect
courses.description: Plan common SD-WAN deployment scenarios using Fortinet Secure SD-WAN.

certifications.name: Fortinet Certified Solution Specialist (FCSS) — Public Cloud Security

courses.name: Public Cloud Security
courses.description: Design and operate Fortinet public-cloud security architectures across major providers.

courses.name: Public Cloud Security Architect
courses.description: Understand major cloud components and the security challenges these environments present.

certifications.name: Fortinet Certified Solution Specialist (FCSS) — Cloud Security

courses.name: FortiMail Administrator
courses.description: Use FortiMail to protect the network from email-borne threats.

courses.name: Public Cloud Security Architect
courses.description: Understand major cloud components and the security challenges these environments present.

certifications.name: Fortinet Certified Solution Specialist (FCSS) — Security Operations

courses.name: FortiSOAR Administrator
courses.description: Deploy, configure, manage, operate, and monitor FortiSOAR in a SOC.

courses.name: FortiSIEM Analyst
courses.description: Use FortiSIEM and integrate it into a network awareness infrastructure.

courses.name: Security Operations Architect
courses.description: Design, deploy, and manage a Fortinet SOC using FortiSIEM and FortiSOAR; analyze and respond to incidents.

courses.name: FCX Immersion (recommended training)
courses.description: Two-day lab immersion to practice product configuration and prepare for the practical exam.
